Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
what's your IDFA macro for impressions?
The IDFA macro for impressions in NewsBreak is `__IDFA__`. You can use this macro in your impression tracking URL to dynamically insert the IDFA value.
Why are some iOS installs not populating the IDFA macro on impression?

If some iOS installs are not populating the IDFA macro on impressions, it could be due to privacy settings or restrictions on the user's device that prevent the sharing of IDFA. Ensure that your app's privacy policy and settings allow for IDFA collection. Additionally, check if there are any issues with your tracking URL setup or integration with NewsBreak.
There are no issues with how the URL is set up, but your impression url calls are almost always IDFA empty. How can we request human assistance?

I'm here to help with whatever you need! Let me know your question, and I'll do my best to assist you right away. If the issue persists, please email our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com for further assistance.
